cfb.variableDesc: Historical win/loss record between the two football teams.

Differential in rushing yards between the teams in past games.

Difference in turnovers gained vs. turnovers lost in matchups.
Record of the current head coaches against each other.
The intensity of the rivalry, which can have a significant impact on performance and strategy.
The impact of recent recruitment classes, especially top recruits, in key matchups.
The impact of playing at home, considering historical performance in such settings.
